message.entry: Each cell in text string must be a character vector.
The text string must be a scalar or the number of text strings must equal the number of rows in position.
The number of box colors must be equal to the number of rows in position.
The number of text colors must be equal to the number of rows in position.

The default font, {0}, does not contain one or more characters that you specified as input. Consider either removing these characters or using a different font file that contains them. Different font can be specified using the 'Font' parameter value pair.

The specified font, {0}, does not contain one or more characters that you specified as input. Consider either removing these characters or using a different font file that contains them. Different font can be specified using the 'Font' parameter value pair.
FontSize must be constant for code generation.
MS Mincho font is not supported for font size over 15.
Unable to find the font file. Please run MATLAB in JVM mode or install a TrueType font.
